commit message:
SettingsActivity: Add the Toolbar.

For some reason, I thought this wasn't possible before, but this now
seems like the appropriate thing to do.

Use mipmap instead of drawable for the launcher icon.

As suggested by android-lint. This also moves the ic_launcher.png
files into mipmap-*/ folders instead of the drawable-*/ folders.
I think the idea is that devices may want to use different versions
of these images for the launcher than they would normally use for
other icons.

styles.xml: Use the .NoActionBar version of the AppCompat theme.

I don't know what advantage this has, but it is recommended here,
when using Toolbar instead of ActionBar, though just calling
ActionBarActivity.setSupportActionBar() seems to work fine
already:
http://android-developers.blogspot.de/2014/10/appcompat-v21-material-design-for-pre.html
toolbar.xml: Use the .NoActionBar version of the theme here too.
styles.xml: No need to set windowActionBar if using .NoActionBar theme.

Revert 'ClassifyActivity: Don't bother delaying startNextClassification().'

This reverts commit 2f0f7b3d2b5f7c8be3b867ae203bd904dff3757e.

Because it apparently really is necessary:
https://github.com/murraycu/android-galaxyzoo/issues/10#issuecomment-72815696

Closing InputStreamReader instances.

Instead of just new-ing them and forgetting about them.

Put fragment transactions on one line of code.

android-lint complains (falsely) about missing commits otherwise.

Add the French translation.

The fr.json file is from here:
http://www.galaxyzoo.org/locales/fr.json
(Which is under the Apache 2 License according to the statement
on http://translations.zooniverse.org/ .)
and the strings.xml file is from Transifex:
https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/android-galaxyzoo/translate/#fr_FR
under the GPL3 License. Thanks to Dostoi.
